item.title: #TIL : Create SSH tunnel manually
item.description: Create SSH tunnel manually SSH Tunnel is a fast way to transfer traffic through unsafe internet today. It would be used in MySQL connect, FTP connect or HTTP connect, … Syntax : $ ssh -L [local_port]:[remote_endpoint]:[remote_port] [ssh_user]:[ssh_ip] Example : Lets say you have a EC2 instance (123.45.67.89) and remote DB instance (98.76.54.32) listening port 3306 $ ssh -L 3307:98.76.54.32:3306 root@123.45.67.89 Testing ssh tunnel $ telnet 127.0.0.1 3307 $ # or $ mysql -h 127.
